explains: adj. 感到绝望的；表现绝望的；无望的
v. 绝望；失望（despair 的 ing 形式）
wordGroup: in despair 绝望地，失望地
despair of 失望，丧失信心；对…绝望

sentences.en: With every day that passed he became ever more despairing.
sentences.cn: 随着日子一天天过去，他越来越绝望。

sentences.en: The boy uttered a despairing groan, and ceased from his struggles, panting.
sentences.cn: 那孩子发出一声绝望的呻吟，停止了挣扎，喘着气。

sentences.en: With a despairing scream the pirate leapt upon Long Tom and precipitated himself into the sea.
sentences.cn: 随着一声绝望的尖叫，海盗跳到长射程大炮上，猛扎进海里。
